Texts.Eng:
Through natural evolution, these former quadrupeds gained more human characteristics, at the cost of their transformative abilities. Though they have accomodated for this with special armor.
    
  Diet: Omnivore


^orange;Perks^reset;:
  Energy x^green;1.15^reset;, +10% Speed & Jump
  Resist: ^green;5^reset;% Cosmic, ^green;10^reset;% Radiation
  Immune: Radiation

^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
  Defense x^red;0.95^reset;
  -^red;20^reset;% Physical Resistance, -^red;10^reset;% Poison Resistance, -^red;5^reset;% Shadow Resistance

^orange;Environment^reset;:
  Lush, Forest, and Jungle:
    +^green;5^reset;% Speed & Jump
  Hot Biomes:
    +^green;10% Fire Resist^reset; / -^red;10% Ice Resist^reset;
  Cold Biomes:
    +^green;10% Ice Resist^reset; / -^red;10% Fire Resist^reset;

^orange;Weapons^reset;:
  Broadsword, Shortsword, Spear, Shortspear, Scythe, Rapier, Dagger:
    Damage x^green;1.2^reset;
  Pistol, Machine Pistol, Shotgun, Bow, Boomerang, Yoyo:
    Damage x^red;0.85^reset;
  Perfect Block: Gain increasing Damage
